rukus.text: 55|26|avite (bhumukhatt‌)yulla ellavarum nasicc peakunnavarakunnu
55|27|mahatvavum udaratayum ullavanaya ninre raksitavinre mukham avasesikkunnatan‌
55|28|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|29|akasannalilum bhumiyilum ullavar avaneat ceadiccu keantirikkunnu. ella divasavum avan karyanirvahanattilakunnu
55|30|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|31|he; bharicca rant samuhannale, ninnalute karyattinayi nam olinnirikkunnatan‌
55|32|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌

55|33|jinnukaluteyum manusyaruteyum samuhame, akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum mekhalakalil ninn puratt katannu peakan ninnalkk sadhikkunna paksam ninnal katannu peayikkealluka. oru adhikaram labhiccittallate ninnal katannu peakukayilla
55|34|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|35|ninnal iruvibhagattinreyum nerkk tijvalayum pukayum ayakkappetum. appeal ninnalkk raksamargam svikarikkanavilla
55|36|appeal ninnal iruvibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|37|ennal akasam peattippilarukayum, at kulampu pealullatum reas niramullatum ayittirukayum ceytal
55|38|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|39|oru manusyaneatea, jinnineatea anne divasam avanre papattepparri anvesikkappetukayilla
55|40|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|41|kurravalikal avarute atayalam keant tiriccariyappetum. ennitt (avarute) kutumakalilum padannalilum pitikkappetum
55|42|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|43|itakunnu kurravalikal nisedhicc tallunnataya narakam
55|44|atinnum tilaccupeallunna cutuvellattinumitakk avar currittiriyunnatan‌
55|45|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
